messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Patches is set to brig for 1 minute

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Masterkey is set to borg or reprogram, and patches shall be brigged for 1 minute

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Atenttion crew! Due to budget cuts we are hosting a system wide cooking competition on your station! The space chef Zatstukia Mackerol has also joined the competition. the winner will get a free chameleon projector and a syndicate balloon. Taken from our nearest raid on their moon base. Have a safe shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Medbay Treatment Center.
